objects.name: Analytic 0164
objects.description: Detect manipulation of system or application files in `/Library`, `/System`, or user data directories using FSEvents and Unified Logs. Identify anomalous process execution modifying plist files, structured data, or logs outside expected update cycles.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Anomalous plist modifications or sensitive file overwrites by non-standard processes

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:osquery
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: open, execve: Unexpected processes accessing or modifying critical files

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Whitelisted processes authorized to modify plist or configuration files.
Baseline hash values for key files to support integrity validation.
